page.title: 10BURNHAM-ON-SEA AS A RESORT.
page.content:
Many people come to Burnham year after year for their holidays. This must be because we have a mild climate here, although the air is frequently bracing with westerly winds. We also have miles of golden sands which is lovely for children to play in. Being a river estuary there are also patches of mud, but these are well marked and easy to avoid.
Burnham is particularly famous for its glorious sunsets, and of course it is easily reached because of the proximity of the M5. It is an extremely good centre to visit if you want to tour Somerset or Avon, and there are dozens of gorgeous tourist attractions and places of natural beauty within easy reach.
